sense.def:
To be inconsistent
pomeni vesti se različno v podobnih okoliščinah;

seg.quote: The blame was laid on an inconsistent government.
Some of your answers are rather inconsistent.
His life was full of inconsistencies.
...the complete inconsistency between the two views expressed by John.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
inconsistent with a particular set of ideas or values
, ni v skladu z določeno skupino zamisli ali vrednot.

seg.quote: ...a monarch whose behaviour they judged to be inconsistent with Hindu religious values.
